page.title: 06Tean High Street(cont.)
page.content: Several hairdressers, a Co-op Foodstore and a Grocers shop next to the Village Hall complete this side of the Street. Next to the Mill is the old Hall, a black and white building built in 1613, in front of which is the Village War Memorial. There are 'bus stops on either side of the street for people to travel to Stoke and Uttoxeter.I was told that the High Street is a more pleasant street since the village was by-passed last February(1985).Before that, many accidents occurred with shops and houses damaged by lorries that could not manouevre around the bend at the East end of the street.
